Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or factual information provided to support the existence of a fire at the Tulsa school.

Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there was no fire and East Central High School is not closed.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for the closure of the Tulsa school, as it falsely attributes it to a fire.
Falters at times: The claim falters in terms of accuracy and reliability, as it is based on a fake news story generated on React365.com.
